commits: 3e98fd7: test(#11): add log-manager regression tests and update CLAUDE.md (Phase 3)

coverage_areas: createLog - 7 tests (new file, append, codex/gemini/default toolId, directory creation, separators)
readLog - 4 tests (existing file, missing file, default/codex toolId)
listLogs - 7 tests (filter by worktreeId, reverse sort, all tools, default, empty, error handling, directory creation)
appendToLog - 6 tests (existing file, new file, codex/gemini/default headers, directory creation)
cleanupOldLogs - 6 tests (delete old files, iterate all dirs, no files, skip non-md, error handling, default 30 days)

changes: Updated src/lib/utils.ts entry to include escapeHtml()

message: Phase 3 complete. 33 regression tests for log-manager.ts all passing. CLAUDE.md updated with 3 new module entries and escapeHtml mention.
